sen.j: 鐘楼（しょうろう、しゅろう）とは、寺院内にあって梵鐘を吊し、時を告げる施設。
sen.e: Shoro or shuro, in which bonsho (a big Buddhist bell) is hung, is placed in the premises of a temple and is used for informing people around it of time by ringing the bell.

sen.e: The term of Shoro is also used for indicating a similar facility in Christianity-related buildings (such as churches and chapels).
